properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_CATEGORY , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_READ_COUNT , TO_CHAR(NOTICE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') NOTICE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_READ_COUNT = NOTICE_READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_CATEGORY , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , N.ADMIN_NO , ADMIN_ID , TO_CHAR(NOTICE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') NOTICE_DATE , NOTICE_READ_COUNT FROM NOTICE N JOIN ADMIN A ON(N.ADMIN_NO = A.ADMIN_NO) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_NO = ? AND REF_TYPE = 5 ORDER BY FILE_LEVEL ASC
